channel.title: Request : Add meek PT support to Whonix Gateway
channel.description: Hi, It seems meek is not easy to filter because access to google / amazon services will get filtered at the same time. I wish if meek can be added to Whonix Gateway so it can be used. Even obfs3 get filtered soon, so meek can help whonix users. Thanks.

item.title: Request : Add meek PT support to Whonix Gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Hi, itâ€™s a fine idea.

Can probably be used as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian already, but currently difficult, because undocumented.

We got a tickets to remember about this request:

  • https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/22
  • https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/53
  • https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/167

We need more documentation / code contributors to make it happen anytime soon.

Read full topic
item.source: Request : Add meek PT support to Whonix Gateway

item.title: Request : Add meek PT support to Whonix Gateway
item.dc:creator: Grai
item.description:
Hi,
It seems meek is not easy to filter because access to google / amazon services will get filtered at the same time.
I wish if meek can be added to Whonix Gateway so it can be used. Even obfs3 get filtered soon, so meek can help whonix users. Thanks.
